results.title: Is metformin use associated with changes in urinary parameters in stone formers?
results.text_hl: Is @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use associated with changes in urinary parameters in @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Calculi</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007669 @@@stone formers@@@?

citations.NLM: Rosen DC, Bamberger JN, Kaplan-Marans E, Paranjpe I, Kapoor A, Gallante B, Atashsokhan DJ, Zampini AM, Khusid JA, Atallah WM, Gupta M. Is metformin use associated with changes in urinary parameters in stone formers? Can Urol Assoc J. 2022 Feb;16(2):E88-E93. PMID: 34582339

results.title: Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice.
results.text_hl: While both @CHEMICAL_Ursodeoxycholic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014580 @@@UDCA@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (d 1-105) prevented @DISEASE_Gallstones @DISEASE_MESH:D042882 @@@gallstone formation@@@ and @DISEASE_Cholecystitis @DISEASE_MESH:D002764 @@@cholecystitis@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (d 64-105) group had a few small @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Calculi</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007669 @@@stones@@@.

citations.NLM: Dorvash MR, Khoshnood MJ, Saber H, Dehghanian A, Mosaddeghi P, Firouzabadi N. Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice. Eur J Pharmacol. 2018 Aug 15;833():165-172. PMID: 29883669
